title: Ep 64 | The Greatest Mission Statement on Earth | Charlie Kirk | The Glenn Beck Podcast
description:
Today’s youth are not the lazy socialists they’re seen as – and Charlie Kirk is proof. At just 26 years old, he’s the founder and president of Turning Point USA, the fastest-growing youth organization in America. A fresh conservative voice acclaimed by President Trump, he and TPUSA promote the principles of freedom, free markets, and limited government on over 1,500 campuses nationwide. Glenn and Charlie sit down for a crossover interview covering the biggest questions in conservatism: Should the Right support bans? Are we still “one nation under God?” And can freedom still accomplish miracles? The Declaration said it best: “All Men are created equal.” But we must be free to fail, free to progress, and free to succeed.

Today’s episode is a special cross post brought to you with our friends at The Charlie Kirk Show.


This Week’s Sponsor:

Achieve a slightly better version of yourself with the DUKE CANNON Moderate Self-Improvement Box – American-made grooming goods that work as hard as you do. Get 15% off your entire order at https://DukeCannon.com with the promo code BECK.
